entry.summary: Introduction I started programming in C++ six years ago, starting with a few toy projects on Unreal Engine 4. I had a small experience before, having programmed in C#, Java, Python but, C++ really hooked me up for several reasons: The art of pointers The power of template metaprogramming The really big ecosystem of libraries, tools, etc And flexing about me doing C++!
